additional: The Honda Civic is a compact car with praiseworthy performance, high fuel economy, excellent passenger space, and a refined design. It is one of the best-selling vehicles of all time.
The Hyundai Elantra is a comfortable and efficient compact car with a stylish design and impressive fuel economy. It is one of the highest-rated compact sedans.
The new Toyota Camry is a fuel-efficient evolution of the midsize sedan, now with a standard hybrid drivetrain. It has impressive mpg and a roomy and comfortable cabin.
The Kia K5 is an attractive and accomplished midsize sedan with an individual style. It is incredibly easy to drive and comfortable for long trips, making it a sensible and exciting choice.
The Honda Accord is a well-rounded midsize sedan with a smooth ride, spacious interior, and great safety scores. It is the highest-rated midsize sedan and one of the best-selling cars in the US.

The BMW 5 Series is a luxurious midsize sedan with powerful engines and a full complement of in-car and driver safety tech. It is a "Goldilocks" sedan, falling between the full-size BMW 7 Series and the compact 3 Series.

The Genesis Electrified G80 is an all-electric version of the popular Genesis G80. It has a powerful all-wheel-drive, dual-motor powertrain and offers a luxurious, high-tech interior with impressive performance and efficiency.
The Mercedes-Benz C-Class is a refined small luxury sedan with a premium interior, potent power, and an efficient hybrid powertrain. It is positioned above the smaller CLA and below the E-Class.
The Audi A3 is a beautifully designed small luxury sedan with sporty handling and a premium interior. It has a powerful turbocharged four-cylinder engine and a high-tech infotainment system.
